configuration:
fs.defaultFS <% if hadoop2_namenodes.count > 1 %> hdfs://<%= node[:hadoop2][:hdfs][:cluster] %> <% elsif hadoop2_namenodes.count == 1 %> hdfs://<%= hadoop2_namenodes.first[:fqdn] %> <% else %> file:// <% end %>
hadoop.tmp.dir <%= node[:hadoop2][:tmp_dir] %>/${user.name}
net.topology.node.switch.mapping.impl org.apache.hadoop.net.TableMapping
net.topology.table.file.name /etc/hadoop2/topology.data
ha.zookeeper.parent-znode /ha
<% if node[:hadoop2][:fs][:s3][:access_key] %>
fs.s3.awsAccessKeyId <%= node[:hadoop2][:fs][:s3][:access_key] %>
fs.s3.awsSecretAccessKey <%= node[:hadoop2][:fs][:s3][:secret_key] %>
fs.s3n.awsAccessKeyId <%= node[:hadoop2][:fs][:s3][:access_key] %>
fs.s3n.awsSecretAccessKey <%= node[:hadoop2][:fs][:s3][:secret_key] %>
<% end %>
